description: This lemonade recipe makes for a refreshing non-alcoholic cooler on warm days and a grown-up alternative to cocktails on summer nights.

default: large handful fresh mint, leaves picked
sparkling mineral water, to top up

steps: Place the mint leaves into a tea towel and bruise with a rolling pin.
Add the mint to a pitcher, with the lemon juice and zest and sugar cane syrup.
Top up with sparkling water. Mix the cocktail well and add more sugar cane syrup, to taste.
title: Mint lemonade
